reviewText: Holy Excitement....is what this concert performance is!  This concert made me think of Queen in a whole new light!  Now I know Freddie Mercury didn't make this band what it is alone!  OMG...Brian May and Roger Taylor are great musicians and great vocalists as well bringing back to life some old rememberable songs such as 39 and I'm In Love With My Car!  And then there's Paul Rogers...wow, what singing!!!  He does The Queen songs justice!  Plus we also get a bunch of songs from his Bad Company catalog that I've never heard live before being Shooting Star and the song Bad Company itself which sound even better with Queen backing him up!!!  All in all the concert is over 2 hours long and well worth the price!  Hell, I bought this at Best Buy for $11.99 which include 3 discs...2 audio and 1 video!  What a deal!  I can't express how good this concert is!  You better watch it and decide for yourself!  If you grew up in the 70's and was a fan of Queen, Bad Company and Free....you won't be disappointed!
summary: Old School Rock And Roll Gets Jolted Back To Life!!!

reviewText: i love paul rodgers and queen, separately and together. the songs are great, the crowd is fun to watch. another one for true queen/paul rodgers fans.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This dvd is by far the best of all the Queen ,Paul Rodgers performances on DVD. The rawness of this concert is fresh and full of energy, Paul Rodgers's vocals are emaculate and  really does justice to Queen songs as well as his Bad. Company tracks. every Musician is at their peak in this show, but then again if you were to have over 350,000 screaming fans in one venue you would want to be at your best, plus having that much adrenaline flowing through you with that big of a audience present. So for those who still can't accept this lineup , give it a chance, I think if Freddie himself was watching this wherever he is, he would be very proud and pleased.
summary: Superior to Return of the Champions !
Title: N/A

reviewText: Another stunning show by Queen + Paul Rodgers!!  I must admit I was one of the millions who thought this was a weird/bad idea when I first heard of this meeting and after their initial live DVD plus recent album and oh...I did see them live ....I have never been so happy to be wrong!  Rather than get a Freddie impersonator Paul brings his own considerable swagger as well as a brace of great songs himself to the mix and its kick a..butt rock n roll!  This is 2 full hours of brilliant music, and its filmed well and the sound is hot!!
summary: they have the whole cosmos rockin!!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Paul Rodgers is incredible.  The concert dvd is worth it just for the Bad Company tunes, would have liked more Bad Company, less Queen, never really been a Queen fan.  If Paul Rodgers would resurrect Bad Company, that would be a reunion! With that being said, his voice is stellar on all the Queen tunes, such a gifted singer/musician!!!!
summary: should be Paul Rodgers with Queen as the back up band; he is phenomenal; the Bad Company tunes dominate the Queen tunes,
